docs.text: Welcome to MkDocs For full documentation visit mkdocs.org . Commands mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs help - Print this help message. Project layout mkdocs.yml # The configuration file. docs/ index.md # The documentation homepage. ... # Other markdown pages, images and other files.
docs.title: Home

docs.text: cgroups view cgroup info of process via pid (ubuntu 18.04)\ ps -o cgroup 12345 create memory cgroup (ubuntu 18.04)\ sudo mkdir /sys/fs/cgroup/memory/cgroup-a limit memory of anything running in the cgroup cgroup-a to 4096 bytes (ubuntu 18.04)\ echo 4096 | sudo tee /sys/fs/cgroup/memory/cgroup-a/memory.limit_in_bytes add process via pid to the cgroup cgroup-a (ubuntu 18.04)\ sudo echo 12345 > /sys/fs/cgroup/memory/cgroup-a/cgroup.procs using libcgroup create memory cgroup cgroup-a (ubuntu 18.04)\ sudo cgcreate -g memory:cgroup-a delete memory cgroup cgroup-a (ubuntu 18.04)\ sudo cgdelete memory:cgroup-a run app app-a in cgroup cgroup-a (ubuntu 18.04)\ sudo cgexec -g memory:cgroup-a app-a
docs.title: cgroups

docs.text: view cgroup info of process via pid (ubuntu 18.04)\ ps -o cgroup 12345 create memory cgroup (ubuntu 18.04)\ sudo mkdir /sys/fs/cgroup/memory/cgroup-a limit memory of anything running in the cgroup cgroup-a to 4096 bytes (ubuntu 18.04)\ echo 4096 | sudo tee /sys/fs/cgroup/memory/cgroup-a/memory.limit_in_bytes add process via pid to the cgroup cgroup-a (ubuntu 18.04)\ sudo echo 12345 > /sys/fs/cgroup/memory/cgroup-a/cgroup.procs

docs.text: create memory cgroup cgroup-a (ubuntu 18.04)\ sudo cgcreate -g memory:cgroup-a delete memory cgroup cgroup-a (ubuntu 18.04)\ sudo cgdelete memory:cgroup-a run app app-a in cgroup cgroup-a (ubuntu 18.04)\ sudo cgexec -g memory:cgroup-a app-a
